mapper.insert:
insert all into board (seq, user_id, bcode, name, email, subject, content, hit, logtime) values(#{board.seq}, #{board.userId}, #{board.bcode}, #{board.name}, #{board.email}, #{board.subject}, #{board.content}, 0, sysdate)
into stopby (seq, step, x, y) values (#{item.seq}, #{item.step}, #{item.x}, #{item.y})
select * from dual
mapper.select: select b.seq, b.name, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.logtime, b.bcode from board b where b.seq = #{seq}
